Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1794464592567721984/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "F(ear), F(rustration), G(oal) and A(spiration)"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1794464592567721984/)_"
---
For the topic of “[PROMPT]“, what are common fears, frustrations, goals, and aspirations? Return your answer in a person's own words using I-statements, like you would get in a survey or product review.

Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE] language.
